messages.title: Lib Dems will cut tax for millions of Britons
I WILL FIGHT FOR OUR NHS: DUFFIELD
messages.content: Local campaigner Andrew Duffield has been fighting to improve NHS services for local people. One of the most serious issues is the lack of ambulance staff in the Hexham area.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Vince Cable and the Lib Dems will cut tax for millions of Britons.
Andrew Duffield is fighting to improve NHS services, addressing the lack of ambulance staff and ensuring local hospitals stay open.
Andrew Duffield aims to support post offices, local businesses, and improve amenities for young families.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Voting Labour will just help the Conservatives in our area.

issues.health: Andrew Duffield is committed to fighting for the NHS to improve services and keep local hospitals like Hexham General Hospital open.

politicalExperience.achievements: Leading the campaign to protect our local NHS.

quotes.text: Andrew Duffield has been leading the campaign to protect our local NHS.

images.caption: Andrew Duffield interacting with NHS staff.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet contains strong messaging around local NHS services and includes an attack on the Conservative party by criticizing their view towards NHS.
